title: Ambient Video Game Music - Tropical Islands 2
description: Elevate your gaming soundscape with our freshly released collection of ten all-new ambience packs, each capturing the distinct aura of a unique tropical island.
longDescription:
Elevate your gaming soundscape with our freshly released collection of ten all-new ambience packs, each capturing the distinct aura of a unique tropical island. This sequel offering continues our commitment to auditory excellence, once again marrying high-quality sound effects with sophisticated design.


Immerse your players in the captivating world of tropical islands teeming with melodious bird calls, soothing rhythmic sounds of ocean waves reaching the shore, and the tranquil whispering of palm leaves stirred by the gentle breeze. But the second instalment doesn't stop at matching its predecessor's offerings, it surpasses them.


We have ventured further into the sonic landscape of tropical paradises, introducing carefully composed ambient music tracks in each pack. These tracks, subtly interwoven with the natural sound elements, add a new layer of depth and emotion to your gaming environment. They set the mood, build tension, and enhance the overall feel of the scenes, without overpowering the natural sounds.


Dive into a more nuanced soundscape, let your games tell deeper stories and create even more memorable gaming moments with this comprehensive collection. The sand may not be real, but the auditory experience will be genuinely immersive and unforgettable.


This pack contains 10 tracks that are each 3 minutes long for a total 30 minutes of audio


--


Music Preview 1: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4wagFqekkbM

Music Preview 2: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OFzzghorUIk

Music Preview 3: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YnFyNjK7K-8


--


Do you want to add an extra layer of immersion to your games?


Then check out our ambient video game music collections! These soundtracks will help transport you to different worlds, alien planets, frozen tundra's, Japan & hundreds of other scenarios and locations, adding an extra level of realism and excitement to your gameplay. Whether you are a game developer looking for high-quality sounds to use in your new games or breath life into some existing projects, our music collections are perfect for you!


--


We also have a number of other music collections and bundles available for sale at our publisher page, click here to check out our catalogue.
technicalDetails:
Sample rate / bit rate: (44,100 Hz)

Do Sound FX loop: (No)

Minutes of audio provided: 30 minutes

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)
